decks.notes: This deck aims to use a combination of Fable of the Mirror-Breaker, Indomitable Creativity, and Leyline Binding to cheat powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty onto the battlefield early. The deck focuses on using creative ways to generate value and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Wrenn and Six. By using a diverse range of spells and land cards, the deck can control the game while setting up explosive combo plays to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

This deck revolves around the strategy of utilizing cards like Underworld Breach, Emry, Lurker of the Loch, and Grinding Station to create a powerful combo. By repeatedly casting spells from the graveyard, the deck aims to generate card advantage and quickly mill the opponent's library. It also includes disruptive elements like Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck's overall goal is to assemble the necessary pieces to either win the game through milling the opponent or by utilizing Thassa's Oracle in combination with the milling strategy.
